reviewText:
Absolutely first rate miniseries on the German experience in World War II.  Basically, a German "Winds of War" or "Band of Brothers."  The production values are first class and the battle scenes are amazing.

Other reviewers have dinged this series because it is in a foreign language.  Yes, it is subtitled!  That is not a reason to give it a low review.
i bought this and its in french with french subtitles i want a refund or the correct copy its wrong
